text: Bad Sister () is a 2014 Chinese romantic comedy film directed by Kim Tae-kyun and starring Ivy Chen, Ji Jin-hee and Cheney Chen. The film was released on November 28, 2014. ==Plot== The story of a father who wants to stop his daughter's wedding and ended up teaming with the groom's equally disapproving older sister. ==Cast== * Ivy Chen * Ji Jin-hee * Cheney Chen * Christy Chung * Qi Xi * Li Xinyun * Woo Hye-lim * Liu Yiwei * Xie Dongshen * Liu Xunzimo ==Box office== By December 5, 2014, the film had earned ¥8.79 million at the Chinese box office. ==References== Category:2014 films Category:Chinese films Category:Mandarin-language films Category:2014 romantic comedy films Category:Chinese romantic comedy films Category:Films directed by Kim Tae-kyun Category:2014 comedy films
title: Bad Sister (2014 film)
